Apricot Anti Aging Silicone Review

 

I struggle with chest wrinkles because of abusing my skin in the sun. Â I also have chest wrinkles because of the way that I sleep on my side. Â Arms folded like a book creates lines and over time it creates deep wrinkles.

This is how I have virtually eliminated my chest wrinkles and how I will begin to work on the wrinkles on my hands too.

One more note, ifÂ you have surgical scars or burns scars over even old scars that you thought there was no hope in getting rid of, try the medical grade silicone that has recently come on the market. Â It works amazingly.
